name: Coasting Home
description:
A game about a fish trying to get home to the coast.

Play as a fish trying to get home to the coast, by rolling down the streets in a fish bowl. Watch out for road works and try to get to the end as fast as possible.

Controls:
Use WASD to move the fish and SPACE to jump. 

Credits:
Made in 2 days as part of Global Game Jam 2019, at the Guildford Library.
